entry.dcterms:title: Shaping of Healthy and Pathological Personality: Behaviour Control as a Function of Hierarchically Structured Cerebral Mechanisms 1991-1994
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D18: Shaping of Healthy and Pathological Personality: Behaviour Control as a Function of Hierarchically Structured Cerebral Mechanisms 1991-1994. data sheet. Version: 2009-09-11
entry.dcterms:creator: Kulcsár, Zsuzsanna
entry.dcterms:contributor: Loránd Eötvös University Faculty of Arts
entry.dcterms:description: Eysenck: personality questionnaire: extroversion, neurotics, lie, psychotics; Claridge: schizothymia questionnaire: schizothymia, borderline, psychotics; Zuckerman: sensory experience-seeking analysis: looking for excitement and adventure, disinhibition, experience-seeking, tedium bearing; socialisation scale of Californian personality questionnaire
entry.dcterms:subject: psychology
social behaviour and attitudes
person
survey data
cross-section

Juvenile delinquents: 162 (male: 148, female: 14), young people from youth custody center: 124 (male: 95, female: 29), apprentices: 189 (male: 144, female: 45), grammar-school students: 77 (male: 77).
data collection with questionnaire
